input_email_body:
Subject: Features of Team Collaboration in Project Management Software

I am interested in learning about the collaboration features available in your team management software as a SaaS solution. Could you provide details on task assignment, progress tracking, and communication tools? Are there any features that enhance teamwork and productivity? I seek a comprehensive tool for managing my team's projects effectively.. My contact number is +91-98765-43210.
